title: NerrawBTC
author: NerrawBTC
content: Good day, everyone! I wanted to reintroduce myself to this forum because I used to be a member here around 2016 or 2017. Back then, I was a fresh graduate and stumbled upon this forum through a link on social media that talked about altcoins.As my life became more busy, I took a break from the forum to focus on my girlfriend (who is now my wife, and we have an upcoming child) and my work. I didn't return to this forum until last year, in 2022. I started lurking again, trying to remember my old username and password (I tried using BPIP, but had no luck).I really donâ€™t have intention of creating a new account as I just wanted to read and learn, as I had been doing in other non-crypto forums. Like I frequently visited ForexStation to learn about trading strategies and indicators in the Forex market.However, recently, I've felt a strong desire to create a new account here. The reason behind this is the Pizza Bake Off contest. I have a homemade pizza that I'd love to share, but I was hesitant due to the issue of some users farming merits by posting their pizzas and others claiming they're not "proper" pizzas. Personally, as long as a pizza has the basic ingredients it should be considered a pizza.I've come across various interesting threads. I remember reading about icopress asking for donations for Ukraine, The Pharmacist's request to change his username to The Sceptical Chymist, and the major news about exchanges (such as FTX) that Theymos posted in the announcements, advising users not to keep funds in online accounts. I also support the idea of having a Twitter account for updates, especially since the forum experienced a temporary shutdown for a couple of hours. Lastly, the image problem here in the forum is something that caught my attention.In regard to my old account, even if I recover or remember the details, I have no plans to use it for personal reasons. I also hope to become an active contributor to this forum in the future, but for the time being, my main goal is to continue learning and reading about Bitcoin and altcoins. I'm starting to save money now because I want to buy Bitcoin in preparation for the halving next year, and I also want to save some for the future of my upcoming child.Thank you for spending time reading my post. See you around! PS : I've read already the Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQand I am aware on this.Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PM18. Having multiple accounts and account sales are allowed, but account sales are discouraged.

comments.body: Welcome back to bitcointalk...I would love to believe that indeed you lost your account name ( which is hard to believe ) and it's kinda of strange that in your first thread you have manage to mention the name of more than 2 merit sources and also your first post is in a competition that promises the participants merits. So far, I think it is a no-no area and for some signature campaigns, it is a solid no to use AI for writing. Do take note of this. You should go to this thread created by nutildah to get the gist - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5456516.0
